name: 林家薇
objective: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week 1 Unit 20 Greetings and Farewells (Meeting People)
Week 2 Unit 75 Movies and Unit 78 TV
Week 3 Unit 19 Likes and Preferences and Unit 73 Hobbies
Week 4 Unit 74 Sports and Unit 76 Music, art and Literature
Week 5 Unit 18 Opinions, Agreeing vs Disagreeing and Unit 78 Newspapers
Week 6 OFF
Week 7 Unit 17 Invitations
Week 8 Midterm
Week 9 Schoolwide Proficiency Midterm
Week 10 Unit 60 Clothes and Unit 61 Shopping
Week 11 Unit 62 Food and Unit 63 Cooking and Restaurants
Week 12 Unit 57 Money and Unit 93 Numbers (Bank)
Week 13 Unit 47 Part of Body and Unit 58-59 Health (Hospital)
Week 14 Unit 66 On the Road and Unit 67 Transportation 
Week 15 Unit 68 Work and Unit 69 Job Hunting
Week 16 Unit 79 Telephoning
Week 17 Final
Week 18 Schoolwide Final
scorePolicy:
Schoolwide Midterm 15%
Schoolwide Final 15%
Textbook Midterm 15%
Textbook Final 15%
In-class practice  40%
materials: Vocabulary in Use Intermediate 2nd Edition (2010) Cambridge.
